originalText.text: The Moroccan rug cleaning service provided by this company is simply outstanding! From the moment I contacted them for a free price estimate, I knew I was in good hands. Their team arrived at my home, evaluated the cleaning needs of my Moroccan rug, and provided a competitive quote. The entire process, from collecting the rug to delivering it back after a thorough cleaning, was handled with utmost care and professionalism. They took special care of the delicate wool and ensured that the rug's patterns remained intact. I highly recommend their reliable service to all Moroccan rug owners.

originalText.text: Our carpets had pet and traffic stains. We were impressed with how clean they looked and smelled following the treatment. We were also pleased with the technician, he was very pleasant and there was no attempt to add anything that we had not requested. The price was good. We will use him again the next time we need our carpets cleaned!

originalText.text: I booked a carpet cleaning appointment with New York Carpet a week ago and I was happy with how things turned out. They really did a great job and I am impressed with their work ethic. It only took them an hour or so with their efficient service. Kudos to their nice and friendly technicians!

It only took them an hour or so with their efficient service. Kudos to their nice and friendly technicians!

originalText.text: New York Carpet and their very friendly technicians did a great job deep cleaning my Pakistani and Bukara rugs and upholstery. Definitely got my money’s worth with how well my rugs turned out. Definitely giving them 5 out of 5 stars. Highly recommend!

text.text: New York Carpet and their very friendly technicians did a great job deep cleaning my Pakistani and Bukara rugs and upholstery. Definitely got my money’s worth with how well my rugs turned out. Definitely giving them 5 out of 5 stars. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: I am willingly and heartily going to give New York Carpet five stars for a job well done. I booked a carpet cleaning appointment from them and it was worth it! They did all the magic and turned my house clean. They scrubbed and treated the damages on my carpet. They never fail to communicate to me as well about the whole process to keep me in the loop. The price is reasonable too! Thank you!
